message: I think we can do better. Let's split it evenly!
Inflation is on my side, let's settle this!
Inflation is a concern, but fairness is more important. Let's split it evenly and end this.
Time is money, and inflation is on my side!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than this. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
You're losing value fast, let's settle!
I'm starting to feel the pinch of inflation, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Let's split it closer to 40/60 to make this work.
Inflation is crippling your share, give up!
I'm feeling the pressure, but I'm not giving up. 30/70 is my final offer. Let's end this, or I'll have nothing left.
